source: 2022年4月24日，华视新闻资讯台《华视午间新闻》被爆废公社率先揭发，报导《美丽岛电子报》调查中华民国总统蔡英文施政满意度56%新闻，图卡将行政院院长苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”；同日，华视发布道歉启事，表示“因制图同仁疏失”而将苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”，并向观众致歉。中国国民党立法委员李德维批评，民主进步党遇到自己人出事，就视而不见、听而不闻；NCC变成瞎子与聋子，如同面对镜电视，沦为民进党附属机构。2022年4月25日，监察委员赖鼎铭、叶宜津、林郁容联合新闻稿指出，华视新闻资讯台字幕跑马灯多次发布不实新闻，造成社会不安；本案是单纯标准作业程序（SOP）疏失或其他系统性、结构性问题，文化部与NCC有无善尽督导之责，三人已申请自动调查。
target: On April 24, 2022, the news channel CTV News' "CTV Noon News" was first exposed by the "Waste Public Society", reporting the "Beautiful Island E-News" survey that the satisfaction rate of President Tsai Ing-wen of the Republic of China was 56%. The graphic mistakenly identified Premier Su Tseng-chang as "President". On the same day, CTV issued an apology, stating that due to the negligence of the graphic team, Su Tseng-chang's title was mistakenly identified as "President", and apologized to the audience. KMT legislator Lee Te-wei criticized that the Democratic Progressive Party turns a blind eye and deaf ear when its own people are involved in incidents; the NCC has become blind and deaf, just like facing a mirror TV, it has become a subsidiary of the DPP. On April 25, 2022, Control Yuan members Lai Ding-ming, Ye Yi-jin, and Lin Yu-rong jointly issued a press release stating that CTV News had repeatedly broadcast false news, causing social unrest. Whether this case is a simple negligence of standard operating procedures (SOP) or other systemic, structural issues, and whether the Ministry of Culture and the NCC have fulfilled their supervisory responsibilities, the three have applied for an automatic investigation.

source: 佛图关南面石壁上还有历代题刻，惟清朝前的十余处刻字多已风化而无法辨识，现在保留的多为晚清、民国期间的题刻，内容多是如《佛图关铭》《佛图关》《清正廉明》《西枕双江》《恩周存殁》《廉明慈爱》等功德、节孝碑铭或一些警句。其中，“佛图关”题字约1米见方，落款“光绪壬申四月”（1882年），为题刻中唯一的阳刻；“学成须报国，临难且忘家”题字据传为冯玉祥所书；“挺起胸膛，竖起脊梁”为蒋介石所书，高2.07米，宽约1.5米，现因山体加固仅可见后4字。2022年，渝中区对部分石刻进行了修复。
target: There are also inscriptions on the south-facing stone wall of Foutouguan, but most of the more than a dozen characters before the Qing Dynasty have been weathered and cannot be identified. Most of the preserved inscriptions are from the late Qing and Republic of China periods, mainly including功德碑、节孝碑铭 or some aphorisms such as "Foutouguan Epitaph", "Foutouguan", "Innocent and honest", "West with two rivers", "Eternal memory", "Modest and loving". Among them, the "Foutouguan" inscription is about 1 meter square, with the inscription "Guangxu壬申四月" (1882), the only one in relief; the "Learn and serve the country, face difficulties and forget the family" inscription is said to be written by Feng Yuxiang; "Rise up your chest, stand up your backbone" is written by Chiang Kai-shek, 2.07 meters high and about 1.5 meters wide, but now only the last four characters can be seen due to mountain reinforcement. In 2022, Yuzhong District repaired some of the inscriptions.

### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 世尊往昔说法既久，我时在座，身体疲懈，但念空无相无作，于菩萨法，游戏神通，净佛国土，成就众生，心不喜乐。所以者何？世尊令我等出于三界，得涅槃证，又今我等，年已朽迈，于佛教化菩萨阿耨多罗三藐三菩提，不生一念好乐之心。
target: The Blessed One had been speaking for a long time in the past, and I was present at the time. My body was tired, but I was thinking about emptiness, formlessness and non-action, about the divine powers of the菩萨法, about purifying the Buddha's realm, about benefiting living beings, and yet my heart was not happy. Why? Because the Blessed One was leading us out of the three realms and to the attainment of涅槃, and now, at our old age, we have no desire to participate in the Buddha's teachings on the bodhisattva path of Arahantship.

source: 2022年4月24日，华视新闻资讯台《华视午间新闻》被爆废公社率先揭发，报导《美丽岛电子报》调查中华民国总统蔡英文施政满意度56%新闻，图卡将行政院院长苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”；同日，华视发布道歉启事，表示“因制图同仁疏失”而将苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”，并向观众致歉。中国国民党立法委员李德维批评，民主进步党遇到自己人出事，就视而不见、听而不闻；NCC变成瞎子与聋子，如同面对镜电视，沦为民进党附属机构。2022年4月25日，监察委员赖鼎铭、叶宜津、林郁容联合新闻稿指出，华视新闻资讯台字幕跑马灯多次发布不实新闻，造成社会不安；本案是单纯标准作业程序（SOP）疏失或其他系统性、结构性问题，文化部与NCC有无善尽督导之责，三人已申请自动调查。
target: On April 24, 2022, it was reported in the news of the news information channel of the TVBS that the "Taiwan News" of the Beautiful Island Electronic Paper investigated the satisfaction rate of the governance of Tsai Ing-wen, the president of the Republic of China, at 56%; Touca misidentified the title of Su Tseng-chang, the executive Yuan, as "the president". On the same day, TVBS issued an apology statement, saying that "the mistake of the graphic designer" misidentified the title of Su Tseng-chang as "the president" and apologized to the audience. Li Te-wei, the legislator of the Chinese Nationalist Party (KMT) criticized that the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) did not care about its own people when something happened to them, just like a blind man and a deaf man. The National Communications Commission (NCC) became a blind man and a deaf man, just like a mirror television. On April 25, 2022, the joint news release of the Control Yuan members Yai Ting-ming, Ye Yi-cheng and Lin Yue-jung pointed out that the TVBS news information channel repeatedly published false news, which caused social disorder. This case was just a simple standard operating procedure (SOP) mistake or other systemic and structural problems. The Ministry of Culture and the NCC should have a duty to supervise, and the three people had applied for an automatic investigation.
